meanings.definition: A type of frozen dessert similar to ice cream, but made with a lower fat content.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed the gelatos at the party last night.
meanings.sent2: The gelatos at the gelato shop were delicious.
meanings.sent3: The gelatos were so cold, they made my teeth chatter!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet and refreshing as gelatos on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent5: The gelatos melted in my mouth, leaving a creamy sensation.

meanings.definition: The plural form of gelato, referring to multiple servings of the frozen dessert.
meanings.sent1: We ordered three gelatos for dessert.
meanings.sent2: The gelatos in the display case looked tempting.
meanings.sent3: The gelatos lined up on the table like colorful soldiers.
meanings.sent4: The gelatos were a rainbow of flavors, each one a different delight.
meanings.sent5: The gelatos were a hit at the party, disappearing quickly in the summer heat.
